decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The proposed erection of a  2- storey side, single storey and  two storey rear 
extension to existing dwellinghouse would, by reason of its excessive size,  
position and appearance  in relation to  neighbouring residential properties, be 
unduly obtrusive, detrimental to the amenities of adjoining occupiers and the 
streetscene and is contrary to the Policies ENV 1.1 (All New Development) and        
H 3.4 (Extensions and Alterations)  of the Unitary Development Plan and ENVB 1.1 
(New Development)   and H.6.4 Extensions and Alterations)  of the Revised 
Deposit Unitary Development Plan and Supplementary Planning Guidance, Residential Extension Guidelines.
description: Erection of 2 storey side, single storey and two storey rear extension to existing dwellinghouse
